trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging> event occurs when a change to a user preference is about to be applied.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging>将要应用的用户首选项的更改时，将发生事件。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceChangingEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified user preference category identifier.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceChangingEventArgs"></xref>类使用指定的用户首选项类别标识符。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceCategory"></xref> values that indicate the user preference category that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceCategory"></xref>值，用于指示正在更改的用户首选项类别。

trans-unit.source: Gets the category of user preferences that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在更改的用户首选项的类别。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceCategory"></xref> values that indicates the category of user preferences that is changing.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceCategory"></xref>值，该值指示正在更改的用户首选项的类别。
